result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.orig: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.html: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduitheI was studying hard before the exams.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag staidéar go dian roiṁ na scrúduiṫeI was studying hard before the exams.

result.html: Chrom mé ar an staidéarI started studying seriously.
result.ponchtml: Ċrom mé ar an staidéarI started studying seriously.
